summary: An ordinance amending Section 2 of Ordinance No. 35383, entitled: An ordinance providing for the making, levy and collection of a supplemental assessment and reassessment to provide for certain deficiencies in the fund created to pay the cost and expense of the improvement of 3rd Avenue and other streets, under Ordinance No. 14993, creating Local Improvement District No. 1345", approved November 1, 1915.
